subject: Re: [junit] Testing with a ResultSet
msgSnippet: The Java Tools for eXtreme Programming book by Hightower and Lesiecki has a section in chapter three which details using Ant to create a databse in a given
messageBody:
The "Java Tools for eXtreme Programming" book by Hightower and Lesiecki has
a section in chapter three which details using Ant to create a databse in a
given state. We are using this approach, slighlty modified to clean given
tables vice drop and create. As a plus, it is relatively easy to explain
to a customer and get their assist in creating datasets. It seems
straightforward to use Ant structuring to 'reset' the database to different
states for different tests.
Regards,
Bill
